data.title: Financial Services Archives
data.text:
After rebranding, Tera Bank – as a new brand, needed to raise awareness and be positioned as a cool and modern Bank.

So, we decided to do something extraordinary and useful at the same time,

… And introduced the new product from Terabank – Tera Bike.

Free bike service for Terabank customers – the moving outdoor that was greeted with great enthusiasm!

Outdoor – that our city, with one of the highest air pollution rates needed so much!

Select – is the new personalized Banking by Terabank.

It is the brand of the few. It’s strong, solid and masculine.

The naming highlights the importance of the individualism and exclusivity of selected individuals.

The visual identity of the brand is built around the solid and structural logotype.

An essential part of the logo is letter S and pointing arrows (triangles) that once more symbolize

brand’s concentration on the individual.

Credits

Agency – Windfor’s

Head of Design – Natia Kvaratskhelia

Graphic Designers – Sergo Titenkov, Meko Chikadze

Re|Bank

Pasha Bank Georgia was planning to create a separate brand of a new retail bank

and a range of sub-brands of unique retail financial products.

The concept was a Bank-Supermarket – universal retail bank, focused on meeting

the daily financial needs of ordinary people.

The task of the agency was to develop an umbrella brand of the bank and

a system of sub-brands of products.

Re|Bank

For Changes

Therefore we came up with the naming and visual style that implied re-establishing,

renovating, re-thinking, re-creating and re-evaluating the concept of banking as we know it.

With disruption in the market, we created the notion that something fundamentally

new has appeared in the banking sector.

Video and Visual Style

The simplicity and direct answers were integrated into the brand philosophy.

Therefore Re|Bank and its products were introduced in a minimalistic typography video,

with unique visual and sound styles.

The video acted as an intro to Bank Philosophy and Products.
